Genetic Association Analysis

Source: R/gaawr2.R
gaawr2.Rd

This is an updated version of a Henry-Stewart talk by Zhao (2009, doi:10.69645/DCRY5578 ), which gathers information, meta-data and scripts to showcases modern genetic analysis ranging from testing of polymorphic variant(s) for Hardy-Weinberg equilibrium, association with trait using genetic and statistical models as well as Bayesian implementation to power calculation in study design and genetic annotation. It also covers R integration with the Linux environment, GitHub, package creation and web applications.

Details

Available data and function are listed in the following table.

ObjectsDescription
Dataset 
DiaHealthA Bangladeshi dataset for Type 2 diabetes prediction
diabetesA diabetes dataset
Functions 
welcomeAn enhanced welcome

We can add references such as Francois (2014) .
